org.openscience.cdk.isomorphism.matchers.smarts

Class OrderQueryBond

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.ChemObject
      • org.openscience.cdk.ElectronContainer
        • org.openscience.cdk.Bond
          • org.openscience.cdk.isomorphism.matchers.smarts.SMARTSBond
            • org.openscience.cdk.isomorphism.matchers.smarts.OrderQueryBond
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, IBond, ICDKObject, IChemObject, IElectronContainer, IQueryBond

    public class OrderQueryBond
extends SMARTSBond
    This matches a bond with a certain bond order. Daylight spec indicates that if match a single bond using '-', it should be an aliphatic single bond
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
    Keywords:
    SMARTS
    Belongs to CDK module:
    smarts
